name: Phoenix
description: If at or lower than 0 HP at the end of this turn, heal back up to 50% of HP and discard all cards and shuffle back into draw pile.

hooks.OnTurnEnd: if (Player.CurrentHP <= 0) { Player.CurrentHP = (int)(Player.MaxHP * 0.50); while (PlayerHand.Count > 0) { var card = PlayerHand[0]; PlayerHand.RemoveAt(0); PlayerDeck.Add(card); } Shuffle(PlayerDeck); Log(PlayerDisplayName + " rises from the ashes with " + Player.CurrentHP + " HP!"); }
